item.title: Wrapping C++ libraries to Julia: part 1
item.description: Ability to wrap old program codes to use them in new programming environments is an essential task for efficient code reuse. In this blog post, I will present a minimum working example on how to compile and wrap a shared C ++ library with CxxWrap.jl.
